column1: Uchi////Went for my wife's birthday.  We ended up getting there at Happy Hour
column2: and didn't even know it.  What an awesome deal!  I've only hear that this place is super expensive
column3: but good.  But our bill was less than $150 WITH tip and we went ALL out on the food and drinks.  I can't remember when happy hours ends (I want to say it was 4-7p) so if its your first time
column4: try to go then so you can sample more without killing your wallet.
